The image was published in a newspaper w: but the family depicted in the image was not mentioned in the accompanying article.
The image was found on the website of an: which works with Practical Action in Bangladesh. It was part of an album titled "Practical Action, Bangladesh (PAB)" and was taken on September 22, 2011.
Practical Action: the international NGO that works in Bangladesh, has provided financial support to poor families in coastal areas of the country, but there is no evidence linking the image to the recent Bihar floods.
